message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  What do you say?
I'll take a larger share this round, but I'll still give you something. Will you take it?
Okay, I'll take a smaller share, but I want to keep this game going. Let's see if we can find a compromise.  I propose a 48/52 split.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. Take it or leave it.
I'm starting to feel like we're not going to be able to agree. I'll take a smaller share, but let's try to end this before we both end up with nothing.
